# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
using Base.Threads

function pig_latinify(words)
    result = String[]
    for word in words
        push!(result, pig_latin(word))
    end
    return result
end

function pig_latin(word)
    vowels = "aeiou"
    if first(word) âˆˆ vowels
        return lowercase(word) * "ay"
    else
        first_vowel = findfirst$vowels, word
        consonants = word[1:first_vowel-1]
        rest = word[first_vowel:end]
        return lowercase(rest) * consonants * "ay"
    end
end

println(pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]))
```
